ca.thurn.jgail.algorithm

Class NegamaxSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.thurn.jgail.algorithm.NegamaxSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent, AsynchronousAgent

    public class NegamaxSearch
extends java.lang.Object
implements AsynchronousAgent
    An agent which selects an action via the Negamax search algorithm.

        public static NegamaxSearch.Builder builder(State stateRepresentation)

      • pickActionBlocking

        public ActionScore pickActionBlocking(int player,
                             State rootNode)
        Picks an action for the provided player to take from the provided root node. Blocks the calling thread until a result is available.
        Specified by:
        pickActionBlocking in interface Agent
        Parameters:
        player - The player who this Agent is trying to optimize for.
        rootNode - The current state of the game, using the state representation this agent returned from Agent.getStateRepresentation().
        Returns:
        An ActionScore pair consisting of the action this player should take in the current game state and an optional corresponding heuristic score for this action, where a higher number indicates a better action for the player.

      • getStateRepresentation

        public State getStateRepresentation()
        Specified by:
        getStateRepresentation in interface Agent
        Returns:
        A copy of the null-initialized state object this agent wishes to use for its internal state representation.

      • beginAsynchronousSearch

        public void beginAsynchronousSearch(int player,
                           State root)
        Description copied from interface: AsynchronousAgent
        Instructs the Agent to kick off an asynchronous action search and then return. This method should not block on completion of the search -- the result will be requested later via getAsynchronousSearchResult.
        Specified by:
        beginAsynchronousSearch in interface AsynchronousAgent
        Parameters:
        player - The player who this Agent is trying to optimize for.
        root - The current state of the game.

      • getAsynchronousSearchResult

        public ActionScore getAsynchronousSearchResult()
        Description copied from interface: AsynchronousAgent
        Halts the current asynchronous action search and returns the result. Returning null is allowed to indicate the agent needs more time to find a meaningful result.
        Specified by:
        getAsynchronousSearchResult in interface AsynchronousAgent
        Returns:
        The current best-known action for this agent to take, along with an associated heuristic score, or null if insufficient time has elapsed to find a useful result.

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
